physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'QUOTA' AND %2 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%3, 'NONE') <> 'PARENTSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
